description: Displays detailed information about a specified security configuration. Security configurations in Amazon EMR on EKS are templates for different security setups. You can use security configurations to configure the Lake Formation integration setup. You can also create a security configuration to re-use a security setup each time you create a virtual cluster.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the security configuration.

nested_items.name: securityConfiguration
nested_items.description: Details of the security configuration.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The ID of the security configuration.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the security configuration.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The ARN (Amazon Resource Name) of the security configuration.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The date and time that the job run was created.

nested_items.name: createdBy
nested_items.description: The user who created the job run.

nested_items.name: securityConfigurationData
nested_items.description: Security configuration inputs for the request.

nested_items.name: authorizationConfiguration
nested_items.description: Authorization-related configuration input for the security configuration.

nested_items.name: lakeFormationConfiguration
nested_items.description: Lake Formation related configuration inputs for the security configuration.

nested_items.name: authorizedSessionTagValue
nested_items.description: The session tag to authorize Amazon EMR on EKS for API calls to Lake Formation.

nested_items.name: secureNamespaceInfo
nested_items.description: The namespace input of the system job.

nested_items.name: clusterId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Amazon EKS cluster where Amazon EMR on EKS jobs run.

nested_items.name: namespace
nested_items.description: The namespace of the Amazon EKS cluster where the system jobs run.

nested_items.name: queryEngineRoleArn
nested_items.description: The query engine IAM role ARN that is tied to the secure Spark job. The QueryEngine role assumes the JobExecutionRole to execute all the Lake Formation calls.

nested_items.name: encryptionConfiguration
nested_items.description: Encryption-related configuration input for the security configuration.

nested_items.name: inTransitEncryptionConfiguration
nested_items.description: In-transit encryption-related input for the security configuration.

nested_items.name: tlsCertificateConfiguration
nested_items.description: TLS certificate-related configuration input for the security configuration.

nested_items.name: certificateProviderType
nested_items.description: The TLS certificate type. Acceptable values: PEM or Custom.

nested_items.name: publicCertificateSecretArn
nested_items.description: Secrets Manager ARN that contains the public TLS certificate contents, used for communication between the user job and the system job.

nested_items.name: privateCertificateSecretArn
nested_items.description: Secrets Manager ARN that contains the private TLS certificate contents, used for communication between the user job and the system job.
(string) ---
(string) ---
